attributes.action: Promote low/zero energy buildings and renewable energy
attributes.additional_details:
Development of renewable energy and low/zero energy homes is extremely important to avoid over reliance on dwindling supplies of fossil fuels and resource depletion avoiding the highly polluting nature of fossil fuel supplies whilst providing greater fuel security for the UK.
Over the last 7 years all of my attempts to create a zero energy home running entirely on renewable energy have been blocked as a result of corruption in the planning system and I have a large database of properties where similar problems have been encountered.
A house of commons select committee has concluded that the planning system is the greatest barrier to sustainability in the UK and this is an insurmountable obstacle to anybody doing what I am trying to do.
The planning system needs to be reformed so that it promotes rather than discourages sustainability.
